includedAssets.title: Anne
includedAssets.synopsis: Living on her own in a big city, Buffy assists a woman whose boyfriend mysteriously vanished. In Sunnydale, Buffy's friends battle the forces of evil.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Living on her own in a big city, Buffy assists a woman whose boyfriend mysteriously vanished. In Sunnydale, Buffy's friends battle the forces of evil.

includedAssets.title: Dead Man's Party
includedAssets.synopsis: A Nigerian mask reanimates the dead, forcing Buffy to battle a horde of zombies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A Nigerian mask reanimates the dead, forcing Buffy to battle a horde of zombies.

includedAssets.title: Faith, Hope And Trick
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - Faith, Hope And Trick
includedAssets.synopsis: A charismatic Slayer visits Sunnydale and wins over many of Buffy's friends. Simultaneously, two powerful vampires plot an attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A charismatic Slayer visits Sunnydale and wins over many of Buffy's friends. Simultaneously, two powerful vampires plot an attack.

includedAssets.title: Beauty And The Beasts
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep4 - Beauty And The Beasts
includedAssets.synopsis: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occur in Sunnydale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occur in Sunnydale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occur in Sunnydale.

includedAssets.title: Homecoming
includedAssets.synopsis: As Buffy and Cordelia vie for the Homecoming Queen title, they are targeted by a group of killers participating in 'SlayerFest '98'.

includedAssets.title: Band Candy
includedAssets.synopsis: Adults throughout Sunnydale begin behaving like immature teenagers after they ingest candy manufactured by the forces of evil.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Adults throughout Sunnydale begin behaving like immature teenagers after they ingest candy manufactured by the forces of evil.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Adults throughout Sunnydale begin behaving like immature teenagers after they ingest candy manufactured by the forces of evil.

includedAssets.title: Revelations
includedAssets.synopsis: With some help from Faith's new Watcher, Buffy tries to destroy a glove with legendary power before it falls into the hands of a demon.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With some help from Faith's new Watcher, Buffy tries to destroy a glove with legendary power before it falls into the hands of a demon.

includedAssets.title: Lover's Walk
includedAssets.synopsis: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in the hope that she can create a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him once more.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in the hope that she can create a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him once more.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in the hope that she can create a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him once more.

includedAssets.title: The Wish
includedAssets.synopsis: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.

includedAssets.title: Amends
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions which want him to eliminate Buffy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions which want him to eliminate Buffy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions which want him to eliminate Buffy.

includedAssets.title: Gingerbread
includedAssets.synopsis: After discovering the corpses of two children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After discovering the corpses of two children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After discovering the corpses of two children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.

includedAssets.title: Helpless
includedAssets.synopsis: As her birthday approaches, Buffy loses her Slayer powers and must do battle with a vampire who is not only extremely powerful, but also quite mad.

includedAssets.title: The Zeppo
includedAssets.synopsis: Xander has his own adventure when he encounters a group of reanimated corpses out to construct a bomb, while Buffy finds Hellmouth has reopened.

includedAssets.title: Choices
includedAssets.synopsis: The Mayor takes Willow prisoner after Buffy and her friends steal a box containing demonic energy needed for Ascension Day.

includedAssets.title: The Prom
includedAssets.synopsis: After Angel ends their relationship, Buffy single-handedly battles three fearsome hell hounds so that her classmates can enjoy their senior prom.

includedAssets.title: Graduation Day (Part 1)

includedAssets.title: Graduation Day (Part 2)

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with the Watchers' Council, just as a charismatic but deadly new enemy emerges. Third season of the teen fantasy drama from the mind of Joss Whedon (Avengers Assemble).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with the Watchers' Council, just as a charming but deadly foe emerges. Third season of the fantasy drama from Joss Whedon.

includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
